bibl.title: The Late Antique Image of Menander.
bibl.note: Revised version of a paper read at the session "From Portrait to Icon: Images of the 'Holier Souls' in Roman and Early Christian Art" held at the 1997 annual meeting of the College Art Association. - The late antique sculptured portrait of Menander bestowes upon the poet a physiognomy of divine inspiration appropriate to his new pedagogical role.
bibl.seg: BASSETT Sarah E., The Late Antique Image of Menander.

Revised version of a paper read at the session "From Portrait to Icon: Images of the 'Holier Souls' in Roman and Early Christian Art" held at the 1997 annual meeting of the College Art Association. - The late antique sculptured portrait of Menander bestowes upon the poet a physiognomy of divine inspiration appropriate to his new pedagogical role.
